title: Connectify Hotspot_PRO + Dispatch_PRO 7.2.1.29658 + Activator_V3
description:
Credits to:

sadpart8, Treakie88 and ashok


How to Activate ?
-----------------

1. Install the latest version of Connectify

2. Finish the entire installation and do not reboot

3. Now launch Connectify Activator [Right Click, Run As Administrator]

4. Click Activate PRO button

5. Activator will show a message box saying Connectify successfully activated

6. Wait 1 minute and Launch Connectify

7. ThatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s it you are ready to go with Connectify PRO !

8. Launch Dispatch and make sure its PRO too


Notes
-----

- This activator may work only with the latest Connectify 7.2.1.29658. Not tested with older versions

- The annoying Activate Connectify Windows has been bypassed with the activator V3. Credits should go to ashok for the tip.

- Deactivate PRO function is now fixed and works perfectly.

- Credits should go to Ã¢â‚¬ËœTreakie88' as well, the guy who have coded an intelligent activation block registry tweaks for Connectify.
